name: Galactic NEON
description:
Galactic NEON is a neon-colored, twin-stick shooter set in the infinitely vast space. Master all seven weapons randomly spawned by destroyed enemies. You'll never know what your next weapon will be!

Note: best played with a Xbox 360 controller.

Controls (Mouse & Keyboard):

WASD or arrow keys to move the ship.

Move the mouse to aim the reticle.

Hold the left mouse button to fire gun rapidly.

Esc to pause the game.

Controls (Xbox 360):

Left stick to move the ship.

Right stick to fire. The direction the right stick is held is the direction the ship will fire at.
